name: Coq au Vin
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat oil in your pressure cooker (lid off) and brown the chicken pieces in batches, set aside.
2. Brown the bacon pieces and sliced onions.
3. Add chicken, sift over flour, mix well. Add cognac and light if you wish.
4. Cover with red wine, then add salt, pepper and bay leaves
5. Bring to boil and lock your pressure cooker.
6. After reaching pressure, cook on reduced heat for 25 to 35 minutes.
7. 5 Minutes before end, open pressure cooker (quick release method) and add the mushrooms.
8. Close and finish cooking. Steam potatoes (in separate pressure cooker or conventional steamer) and serve with chopped parsley.
